body.name: Jogujos Retro Video Game Console - Plug and Play Video Games, Retroxplug Game - 2024 Retro Gaming Console Built in 20000+ Games with Dual 2.4G Wireless Controllers (M8-64G)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 59 mins
features: ♐♐♐【Built-in 20000+ Retro Games】: The wireless classic TV game console system comes with over 20,000 built-in games and 9 pre-installed emulators, so you can play all your favorite classic games without the need for downloads or an internet connection.

♐♐♐【High-definition HD Output】: Enjoy Jogujos Retro Video Game Console on the big TV screen by connecting to your TV using a mini HDMI cable. This video game stick supports high definition HDMI output. Make sure your screen has a HD input port. The wireless TV game console can be connected to a TV/TV set-top box/PC/laptop/projector.

♐♐♐【Operation Step】--Just connect the retro gaming console to the power supply, then plug it into the TV, change the TV signal source to the HD channel. Proceed as follows: 1. Connect the HD output of the TV. 2. Insert the built-in TF game card. 3. Use the charging adapter to connect to the TV. 4. The game stick will automatically turn on when the charging adapter is being connected to TV. NOTE: 2 wireless controllers are needed to install 4xAAA batteries which are not included in package.

♐♐♐【2 Wireless Controllers】With 2 PCS 2.4GHz wireless controller adapters, the connection is stable and almost zero latency, the maximum connection distance is 32.8 ft. The Video Game Console supports 2 people to play games at the same time, avoiding the interference of wires while gaming.

♐♐♐【Good Gift Choice】--With two 2.4GHz wireless joystick controllers allow you to play games with friends or family members,nostalgia stick game console not only brings fun playtime to children, but also awakens fond childhood memories, Can releasing your working and life stress. It is an ideal gift for kids and adults on Christmas/birthdays or other occasion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Controllers not working
reviews.reviewText: Looks great on the TV. But that's as far as I got because the Bluetooth wireless usb is not working or communicating with controllers. So send it back and ask for replacement, hoping it works or buy new controllers/usb? Been told ya can't just go by a USB. So yea, no clue if the games work or not
